edu.rit.util

Interface Logger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrintStreamLogger

    public interface Logger
    Interface Logger specifies the interface for an object that logs messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void log(long date, String msg)
      Log the given date and message.
      void log(long date, String msg, Throwable exc)
      Log the given date, message, and exception.
      void log(long date, Throwable exc)
      Log the given date and exception.
      void log(String msg)
      Log the given message.
      void log(String msg, Throwable exc)
      Log the given message and exception.
      void log(Throwable exc)
      Log the given exception.
      void prefix(String prefix)
      Set the prefix.

    • Method Detail

      • prefix

        void prefix(String prefix)
        Set the prefix. The string "prefix: " will be included at the beginning of each log message.
        Parameters:
        prefix - Prefix, or null for no prefix.

      • log

        void log(String msg)
        Log the given message.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message.

      • log

        void log(Throwable exc)
        Log the given exception.
        Parameters:
        exc - Exception.

      • log

        void log(String msg,
       Throwable exc)
        Log the given message and exception.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message.
        exc - Exception.

      • log

        void log(long date,
       String msg)
        Log the given date and message.
        Parameters:
        date - Date and time in milliseconds since midnight 01-Jan-1970 UTC.
        msg - Message.

      • log

        void log(long date,
       Throwable exc)
        Log the given date and exception.
        Parameters:
        date - Date and time in milliseconds since midnight 01-Jan-1970 UTC.
        exc - Exception.

      • log

        void log(long date,
       String msg,
       Throwable exc)
        Log the given date, message, and exception.
        Parameters:
        date - Date and time in milliseconds since midnight 01-Jan-1970 UTC.
        msg - Message.
        exc - Exception.
